Rest/Stress Message guide
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: FAQ (basic essentials, read this first!): Rest/Stress Message guide
By Thorr on Monday, February 4, 2008 - 05:57 am:

Here are the messages that show you monster's energy level -

Very Energetic - Full
Energetic - Full -1
Little Energetic - Full -2
Little Tired - Full -3
Tired - Full -4
Very Tired - Full -5
Exhasted - You'll first see the same screen as Very Tired then followed by this one Full -6 which states that your monster MUST REST!

Stress messages follow the Energy level

Little Stressed - Mild Stress
Very Stressed - High Stress
